rule: Each description must not portray the background or outline the setting of the subjects.
coverage: A young woman with flowing brown hair and a cozy sweater sits peacefully in a sunlit window nook, intently reading a vintage hardcover book. Soft afternoon light filters through sheer curtains, casting gentle shadows and creating a warm, inviting glow. The background features a lush garden with blooming flowers, enhancing the serene and contemplative atmosphere of the scene.
validityText:
The input is a concise English sentence consisting of 5 words and is a natural language description suitable for an AI-generated photo prompt. It is written as a single paragraph and does not exceed the 80-word limit.
OK
